name: Happy Happy Village - Interactive Diorama
description:
For Halloween, I've made a spooky interactive diorama of Happy Happy Village! Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move Ness, and explore the area!

I wanted to test out using normal maps, metallic maps, and other fancy effects on 3D pixel art, and so I made this project as a challenge to see what I could create. Happy Happy Village, being a cult-ridden locale from the game Earthbound, seemed like the perfect locale for a diorama, and being near to Halloween, it worked out all the better.

Please note that all of the pixel art textures belong to Nintendo.
